nodes.bodyText: Need to test with MP Config 1.4
should use config 1.4 by default since that is part of MP 3.3
Just checking... is it right that this test does not use FeatureReplacementAction.EE8_FEATURES() like the others do?
Yes, that is correct.  JSON-B is only in EE8, so we don't need to run it again with any other EE level (until EE9...).
